name: RTCPeerConnection.idpvalidationerror_event
description: An idpvalidationerror event informs the target, a RTCPeerConnection object's onidpvalidationerror event handler, that the identity provider (IdP) encountered an error while validating an identity assertion.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'idpvalidationerror' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
